陣.definition: disposition of troops; wave; spate; burst; spell; short period of time; classifier for events or states of short duration

陣亡戰士紀念日.pinyin: zhèn wáng zhàn shì jì niàn rì

陣列.definition: (computing) array (data structure); (hardware) array (photovoltaic cells, radio telescopes etc)

陣勢.definition: battle array; disposition of forces; situation; circumstance

陣型.definition: formation (of a sports team, troops etc)

陣容.definition: troop arrangement; battle formation; lineup (of a sports team etc)

陣營.definition: group of people; camp; faction; sides in a dispute

陣痛.definition: labor pains; (fig.) distress caused by a disruptive change

陣線.definition: a front (militant group); line of battle; alignment (towards a political party etc)
